title: Jacob's dream
creator_credit: Alan Madden and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: In both his sleeping and waking hours, Jacob encounters a character who provides the basis for the script of his short film; an assessment panel is not impressed. Cast includes John Penman, Bryon Williams, Edward Rosser, John Phillips, Taylor Owynns. Cinematography by Peter Tammer. Music composed and conducted by Christopher Gordon.
